titleNullable: Shells or Pebbles: An Image Classification Dataset
subtitleNullable: A dataset containing images of shells and pebbles for image classification tasks
descriptionNullable: ## Overview The dataset contains two classes: Shells or Pebbles. This dataset can be used to for binary classification tasks to determine whether a certain image constitutes as a shell or a pebble. Cover Image by wirestock on Freepik ## Inspiration I found it cool to create an app with a CV algorithm that could classify whether a certain picture is a shell or image. The next time that I would be visiting a beach, I could just use the app to help me collect either shells or pebbles. 😄
title: Shells or Pebbles: An Image Classification Dataset

This dataset can be used to for binary classification tasks to determine whether a certain image constitutes as a shell or a pebble.
